mapper.select: select e.PERSON_ID, NAME, IDCARD, d.DEPT_ID, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(d.dept_id) deptShow, to_char(SY_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') syStartTime, to_char(SY_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') syEndTime, to_char(FIRST_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') firstStartTime, to_char(FIRST_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') firstEndTime, to_char(SEC_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') secStartTime, to_char(SEC_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') secEndTime, to_char(THIRD_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') thirdStartTime, to_char(THIRD_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') thirdEndTime, to_char(JZ_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jzStartTime, to_char(JZ_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jzEndTime from t_rs_employee e left join T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT d on e.person_id = d.person_id left join T_RS_EMPLOYEE_CONTRACT c on c.person_id = d.person_id where 1 = 1 AND d.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND e.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' AND e.IDCARD like '%'||#{idcard}||'%'

mapper.select: select e.PERSON_ID, NAME, IDCARD, d.DEPT_ID, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(d.dept_id) deptShow, to_char(SY_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') syStartTime, to_char(SY_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') syEndTime, SY_CONTRACT_PERIOD, to_char(POSITIVE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') positiveTime, to_char(FIRST_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') firstStartTime, to_char(FIRST_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') firstEndTime, FIRST_CONTRACT_PERIOD, to_char(SEC_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') secStartTime, to_char(SEC_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') secEndTime, SEC_CONTRACT_PERIOD, to_char(THIRD_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') thirdStartTime, to_char(THIRD_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') thirdEndTime, THIRD_CONTRACT_PERIOD, to_char(JZ_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jzStartTime, to_char(JZ_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jzEndTime, JZ_CONTRACT_PERIOD, PERSON_NATURE, RETIRE_CERT, NUMS, SCHOOL_AGE, CONFIDENT_AGREEMENT, TRPID_SALARY, POSITIVE_SALARY, POSITIVE_COFF, to_char(RETIRE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') retireTime, RETIRE_NY, SSNUMBER, COUNTS from t_rs_employee e left join T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT d on e.person_id = d.person_id left join T_RS_EMPLOYEE_CONTRACT c on c.person_id = d.person_id where d.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and e.PERSON_ID = #{personId}
